title: 109_hr5421
content: Repeals provisions of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 which eliminated the estate and generation skipping transfer tax and carryover basis rules for estates. Reduces the estate tax rate to the lower of 15 or the capital gains income tax rate generally applicable to individual taxpayers. Reduces the gift tax rate to 15. Establishes a single estate and gift tax unified credit amount of $5 million.
